content.question: The first four terms of a geometric sequence are given by <math alttext="g subscript 1 equals 1 fifth"><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></math>, <math alttext="g subscript 2 equals 1"><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>, <math alttext="g subscript 3 equals 5"><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>, and <math alttext="g subscript 4 equals 25"><msub><mi>g</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for the general term of the sequence, <math alttext="g subscript n"><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="g subscript n equals 1 fifth open parentheses 5 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><msup><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

<math alttext="g subscript n equals 5 open parentheses 1 fifth close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><msup><mfenced><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>

<math alttext="g subscript n equals 1 fifth plus 4 over 5 n"><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mi>n</mi></math>

<math alttext="g subscript n equals 1 fifth plus 4 over 5 open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses"><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="g subscript n equals 1 fifth open parentheses 5 close parentheses to the power of open parentheses n minus 1 close parentheses end exponent"><msub><mi>g</mi><mi>n</mi></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><msup><mfenced><mn>5</mn></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><mi>n</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced></msup></math>
